about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling odyssey with companions that starts at a harmless barn attraction and ends at a mysterious gothic mansion. The first chapter:

You and your group have arrived at what seems to be an ordinary haunted attraction, but this is no typical thrill ride. The Haunted Barn and Corn Maze is believed to be the hiding place of Agrithor the Reaper, a demon who only reveals himself at the stroke of midnight. Your mission is to enjoy the haunted attraction, navigate the maze, and remain hidden until the attraction closes. The true hunt begins once the lights go out and the last guest has left. Trained by your grandmother, who is now missing, you must solve a scavenger hunt she left behind, which will lead you to essential items needed to perform a ritual designed to trap and tokenize Agrithor, ensuring he can never escape. But beware—the corn maze is his domain, and he will stop at nothing to prevent his capture. Can you outwit the Reaper, or will you become his next victim?

**Warning:** This game contains flashing lights and intense visual effects that may trigger seizures in individuals with photosensitive epilepsy. Please play with caution.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features realistic depictions of blood and gore, including intense and graphic scenes that may be unsettling to some players. It also includes jump scares and horror elements designed to create a deeply unsettling, and hopefully enjoyable, experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version 1909 revision .1350 or higher, or versions 2004 and 20H2 revision .789 or higher.
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: You and your group arrive at a haunted attraction that hides Agrithor the Reaper, a demon who only appears at midnight. Enjoy the thrills, solve a scavenger hunt left by your missing grandmother, and gather essential items to trap Agrithor—or become his next victim.
